name: VisualLightBox
title: Visual jQuery Lightbox - Beautiful jQuery Lightbox
description: Visual LightBox is a web photo galleries with a nice Lightbox-style overlay effect. * Cross-browser - works perfectly on all browsers (including IE6) * Responsive - smoothly adapts to any browser resolutions and device screens * Mobile-ready - optimized for Android and iOS devices * Search engine friendly and semantically valid * Unobtrusive - even without Javascript, the images are still accessible * Huge collection of fancy Lightbox themes - see live demos * Keyboard navigation - use left/right arrow key to navigate * Floating and smooth cross-fade transition * Lightweight (12Kb only)
